resources.string:
1. The user is shown 20 tiles. Hidden below these tiles are 10 random images each repeated twice. 

 2. The user can touch on any two tiles. Touching on a tile will show the image. 

 3. If the two tiles have matching images, they fill fade out and the user gets a point. (Points are updated at the end of a game) 

 4. If the two tiles do NOT have matching images, they flip over to being tiles again. 

 5. Hitting the back soft key while playing will take the user back to the first screen. Trying to play will restore the playing activity to the previous state.
